byline.contributor: Jesse Coburn and Jason Grant contributed reporting.

abstract: New York Police Dept announces arrest of Robert Costanzo in connection with crime spree on Staten Island around 2007 in which he broke into at least 20 homes in affluent areas, sometimes while residents were home; police say Costanzo, who earned moniker Ninja Burglar, may be responsible for dozens of other Staten Island burglaries over years.

headline.print_headline: Prosecutor Says ‘Reign of Terror’ by the Ninja Burglar Is Over
headline.main: Official Says ‘Reign of Terror’ Is Over for the Ninja Burglar

snippet: The authorities say that Robert Costanzo, who is in custody, is responsible for scores of burglaries on Staten Island and elsewhere over a decade.
